price: A zar oni ne znaju da Allah zna i ono što kriju i ono što pokazuju?!
arabic: أَوَلَا يَعۡلَمُونَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: awalā yaʿlamūna anna al-laha yaʿlamu mā yusirrūna wamā yuʿ'linūna
